page.title: 13LIFE STYLES FASHION
page.content: {CLOTHES Clothes have changed through the ages.The materials most popular today are man-made fibres like polyester, acrylic and nylon.Natural fibres like cotton and wool are very popular too. Business men wear suits to look smart but other men wear casual things like jeans and sloppy pullovers.Women like to wear trousers and catsuits or V back shirts and dresses.Boys like wearing trousers,shirts and jumpers and on their feet they wear fluo- rescent socks.Girls wear trousers, skirts,dresses and blouses.For underwear men wear long johns,vests and Y front pants.Ladies wear bras, girdles,suspenders,garters and briefs. Most ladies wear tights instead of stockings.The tights are made out of nylon.Other tights are made of wool which keep legs warm in the winter.
